text: Artifacts in Motion is the first studio album from Finnish progressive metal band Circle of Contempt. It was released by Sumerian Records on 23 November 2009. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== ;Circle of Contempt *Riku Haavisto – vocals *Risto-Matti Toivonen – guitar *Joni Kosonen – guitar *Markus Karhumäki – bass guitar *JP Kaukonen – drums ;Production * Jori Haukio – production, engineering ==References== Category:2009 debut albums Category:Circle of Contempt albums
title: Artifacts in Motion
